unnormalised: My grandfather, Mr. Sharma, was diagnosed with CAD last year and Dr. Rao at AIIMS suggested an angioplasty ASAP; now he's doing much better after the procedure on 15/08/2023.
normalised: My grandfather, Mister Sharma, was diagnosed with C-A-D last year and Doctor Rao at A-I-I-M-S suggested an angioplasty A-S-A-P; now he's doing much better after the procedure on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three.
